Jellifish

Perfection, Simplified


Find Out More

Features

Simple

All you need to know, when you need it. Don’t worry about when to check on the water or turn off the oven; Jellifish will let you know!

Fun

Now that cooking’s so easy, go ahead and try out those exotic multi-course meal. You’ll get it perfect on the first try!

Fast

Get thing done while waiting for water to boil. Jellifish algorithmically orders tasks across recipes to minimize completion time.

Try It!

About Us

Hi! We’re a team of four student developers comprised of Ilya Krasnovsky, Rushy Panchal, Hector Solis, and Yuan Wang. Jellifish grew out of the HackPrinceton-winning project in November 2015 and has since emerged an exploration of algorithm-directed efficiency in the kitchen. We’re committed to making cooking simple and fun for everyone.

Awards

HackPrinceton Fall 2015, Second Place

Princeton Pitch Fall 2015, Second Place
